data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Limón, Costa Rica. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Limón, Costa Rica
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 70,981 believers find a person of peace today among the 315,919 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Limón a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Limón, Costa Rica that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, please help the 70,981 believers in the state of Limón to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Limón, Costa Rica. Please, stir the 70,981 believers here to pray for awakening.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Limón, Costa Rica.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.
